title: Paris-Roubaix Winner Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Fixated on Tour de France Success: ‘The Next Big Goal of My Career’
content:
Olympic MTB champion making rapid progress since returning to the road, including a storming win this weekend.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix Winner Pauline Ferrand-Prévot Fixated on Tour de France Success: ‘The Next Big Goal of My Career’ on Velo.
